posts.post_title: T206 Lajoie port. & T206 Bender w/ trees
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Ernest
I have these 2 for sale. The Lajoie portrait has only one minor crease at the bottom left with minimal paper loss on back, from original collector, nice shape. Make offer, and e-mail me for scans. The Bender with tree's is in PHENOMINAL condition with 3 sharp corners and one nice corner, no creases and looks pack fresh, with American Beauty back, this card is incredible, havent seen one in this kind of shape. Make offer, and e-mail for scans. Thanks.
